overview: For years, Kara has aspired to be the top realtor at her company - but there's only one problem - it's overrun by a bunch of misogynistic pigs. Frustrated that her talent has been continually unrecognized, Kara conspires with her coworker, Crystal to take down everyone in the company, one man at a time. But, when Kara sees a softer side of one of the men, will she continue picking off one by one, or make an exception in the name of love?
tagline: Never Underestimate The Power Of A 1980's Woman
title: Women Getting Even
